mapper.select: SELECT a.ifmmSeq ,a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmPassword ,a.ifmmDesc ,a.ifmmDob ,a.uuidFileName ,(select ifcdName from infrCode where ifcdSeq = a.ifmmSavedCd) as ifmmSaved ,(select ifcdName from infrCode where ifcdSeq = a.ifmmGenderCd) as ifmmGender ,b.ifmaAddress1 ,b.ifmaAddress2 ,c.ifmeEmailFull ,d.ifmeNumber ,(select ifcdName from infrCode where ifcdSeq = d.ifmeTelecomCd) as ifmeTelecom FROM infrMember a left join infrMemberAddress b on b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq left join infrMemberEmail c on c.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq left join infrMemberPhone d on d.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq};
